articles.title: About us
articles.contents:
What is the goal of NSC-R?
NSC-R is an interdisciplinary community at NSCR dedicated to promoting a fun and supportive culture of co-learning in data science skills and open science principles. We host workshops and social events where attendees can learn and work on projects among friends and colleagues. NSC-R welcomes everyone who wants to better their know-how in all things data, regardless of skill level. We want to replace statistics anxiety and code fear with inspiration and motivation to learn and share.
Contact Us and Get involved
Whether you’re a beginner, intermediate, or expert, we want you to be involved with the NSC-R workshops. There are different ways to get involved
1. Slack
Join the NSC-R slack workspace and be part of our co-learning community. Everyone is welcome. Ask Questions and team up with other members.
2. Mailing List
Join the mailing list. If you have interest, please email to join.
3. Suggest a Workshop
We’re all learners in NSC-R. Request a workshop, and if you are interested in helping teach it, we’ll support you!
xxx

articles.title: When I'm not doing #RStats ...
articles.contents:
Work-in-progress
I do a lot of things that are completely unrelated to R, although R sometimes sneaks in where it doesn’t belong. Eventually I will write about those things here, mostly gardening and home renovations :)
